ComicInfo.Summary:
“THE SPRINGS OF ZHAL,” Part One
Adam Osidis and the Mud King travel the wastelands to the mythical Springs of Zhal, which promise a cure to Adam’s fatal disease—and the offer of the God of Whispers fulfilled. But when you deal with the devil, how soon before he lays claim to your soul?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Jerome Opeña & Matt Hollingsworth | 1 | B | Cover B | Cary Nord | 2 | C | Cover C | Matteo Scalera | 3 | D | Virgin Cover D | Jerome Opeña | 4 |
